instrumentation: soprano, alto, tenor, bass, choir (SATB), 3 trumpets, timpani, 2 recorders, 2 oboes, bassoon, organ obbligato, 2 violins, viola, violoncello, viola da gamba, continuo
notes: Composed for the inauguration of a new town council.

movements.title: Dein Alter sei wie deine Jugend
Du wollest dem Feinde nicht geben
Das neue Regiment auf jeglichen Wegen
